diff_act: 6.transmitting audio to other users in the group

regen.absent_element: automatic loudspeaker volume restoration when call is cancelled
regen.new_specification: The system shall automatically restore the loudspeaker to its initial volume when a call is cancelled.

regen.absent_element: specification for handling the Push-To-Talk function when the handset is lifted or replaced
regen.new_specification: The system shall enable the Push-To-Talk function to be used with the handset, and disable it when the handset is replaced, transferring communication back to the loudspeaker

regen.absent_element: automatic loudspeaker volume restoration when call is cancelled
regen.new_specification: The system shall automatically restore the loudspeaker to its initial volume when a call is cancelled.

label: Picking up the handset shall reduce the loudspeaker volume to its minimum level.
absence: action of reducing the loudspeaker volume to its minimum level
